S04n385:1: atha tasminneva parṣanmadhye sarvanīvaraṇaviṣkambhī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat–paramāścaryādbhutaprāpto'haṃ bhagavan |
S04n385:5: kulaputro'vīcau mahānarake āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
S04n385:11: tatrāsya dharmaṃ deśayati–yasyāḥ kuḍyaprākāraparyantā ayomayī bhūmiḥ samanantaraprajvalitaikajvālībhūtā,
S04n385:15: yathā bahvayudakāyāṃ sthālyāṃ mudgā vā māṣā vā cordhvaṃ gacchanto'dho gacchantaḥ svidyante pacyante,
S04n385:16: evaṃ te sattvā avīcau mahānarake kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavanti |
S04n385:17: tatkathaṃ bhagavan avīcau mahānarake'valokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ praviśati?
S04n385:18: bhagavānāha–yathā kulaputra rājā cakravartī divyaratnamayodyāne praviśati mahatyā cakravartirājyasamṛddhayā,
S04n385:19: evameva kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminnavīcau mahānarake praviśati |
S04n385:23: tadā te yamapālapurūṣāḥ saṃvegacittāḥ paramodvignāścintāṃ samāpadyante–kimasminnavīcau mahānarake'śubhanimittaṃ prādurbhūtam ?
S04n385:28: atha te yamapālapurūṣā asimusalabhindipālatomaragadācakratriśūlādīnupasaṃgṛhya sarvaṃ cāvīcipariṣkāraṃ gṛhītvā yena sa yamo dharmarājastenopasaṃkrāntāḥ |
S04n385:29: upasaṃkramya yamaṃ dharmarājametadavocan–yatkhalu devo jānīyāt prathamam–sā cāsmākaṃ karmabhūmirniravaśeṣaṃ parikṣīṇā abhiramaṇīyā saṃvṛttā sarvasukhasamarpitā |
S04n385:34: kāmarūpī ca tatra puruṣaḥ praviṣṭo jaṭāmukuṭadharo divyālaṃkārabhūṣitaśarīraḥ paramamaitramānasaḥ suvarṇabimbamiva dṛśyate |
S04n385:39: atha sa yamo dharmarājaścintāmāpede–kasya punardevasyāyaṃ prabhāvaḥ ?
S04n385:42: athavā anyeṣāṃ maharddhikadevaputrāṇāmapi varapradānenedṛśaṃ phalaviśeṣaṃ saṃvṛttam ?
S04n385:46: sa ca divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokya tacca devanikāyena paśyati sma–īdṛśaṃ varaṃ kasyānyasya ?
S04n385:47: atha sa punarevāvīcau mahānarake vyavalokayati sma |
S04n385:48: vyavalokya tasminnevāvīcau mahānarake'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvameva paśyati sma ||
S04n385:49: atha sa yamo dharmarājo yenāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ |
S04n385:50: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya stotraviśeṣaṃ kartumārabdhaḥ |
S04n385:109: evaṃ yamo dharmarājo viśeṣataraṃ srotāvadhānaṃ kṛtvā punarapi yamo dharmarājaḥ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraiva prakrānto'bhūt ||
